text: 13|6|Arau sihamte tomara ocarata mangalara purbe amangalara babe kharakheda karae. Athaca sihamtara agata sastira anuraupa bahu (siksaniya) drstanta para haiche. Sihamtara aparaadhara pichato niscaya tomara raba manuhara prati ksamasila arau (suna) niscaya tomara raba sasti pradanato ati kathora.
